Synopsis: Jin Wang is an average teenager balancing high school and home life. When he meets a new foreign student on the first day of the school, even more worlds collide as Jin is unwittingly entangled in a battle with Chinese mythological gods.

Title: Asteroid City
Cast: Director:, Wes Anderson, | ,     Stars:, Jason Schwartzman, , Scarlett Johansson, , Tom Hanks, , Jeffrey Wright
Synopsis: The itinerary of a Junior Stargazer convention is spectacularly disrupted by world-changing events.

Title: Platonic
Cast: Stars:, Rose Byrne, , Seth Rogen, , Tre Hale, , Andrew Lopez
Synopsis: Former childhood best friends reconnect as adults and try to get past the rift that led to their falling out.

Title: I Think You Should Leave with Tim Robinson
Cast: Stars:, Tim Robinson, , Sam Richardson, , Patti Harrison, , Conner O'Malley
Synopsis: A sketch show where Tim Robinson and his guests spend each segment driving someone to the point of needing -- or desperately wanting -- to leave.

Title: A Man Called Otto
Cast: Director:, Marc Forster, | ,     Stars:, Tom Hanks, , Mariana Treviño, , Rachel Keller, , John Higgins
Synopsis: Otto is a grump who's given up on life following the loss of his wife and wants to end it all. When a young family moves in nearby, he meets his match in quick-witted Marisol, leading to a friendship that will turn his world around.

Title: Jury Duty
Cast: Stars:, James Marsden, , Alan Barinholtz, , Susan Berger, , Cassandra Blair
Synopsis: It follows the workings of an American jury trial through the eyes of Ronald Gladden, a juror who is unaware the entire case is fake. Everyone except him is an actor, and everything that happens is carefully planned.

Title: Young Sheldon
Cast: Stars:, Iain Armitage, , Zoe Perry, , Lance Barber, , Montana Jordan
Synopsis: Meet a child genius named Sheldon Cooper (already seen as an adult in The Big Bang Theory (2007)) and his family. Some unique challenges face Sheldon, who is socially impaired.

Title: XO, Kitty
Cast: Stars:, Anna Cathcart, , Minyeong Choi, , Gia Kim, , Sang Heon Lee
Synopsis: A new love story unfolds when teen matchmaker Kitty reunites with her long-distance boyfriend at the same boarding school attended by her late mother.

Title: The Boys
Cast: Stars:, Karl Urban, , Jack Quaid, , Antony Starr, , Erin Moriarty
Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: Shameless
Cast: Stars:, Emmy Rossum, , William H. Macy, , Ethan Cutkosky, , Jeremy Allen White
Synopsis: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

Title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
Cast: Stars:, Charlie Day, , Rob McElhenney, , Kaitlin Olson, , Glenn Howerton
Synopsis: Five friends with big egos and small brains are the proprietors of an Irish pub in Philadelphia.

Title: The Office
Cast: Stars:, Steve Carell, , Jenna Fischer, , John Krasinski, , Rainn Wilson
Synopsis: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

Title: Poker Face
Cast: Stars:, Natasha Lyonne, , Benjamin Bratt, , Simon Helberg, , Pedro Hollywood
Synopsis: Charlie has an extraordinary ability to determine when someone is lying. She hits the road with her Plymouth Barracuda and with every stop encounters a new cast of characters and strange crimes she can't help but investigate and solve.

Title: Beef
Cast: Stars:, Steven Yeun, , Ali Wong, , Joseph Lee, , Young Mazino
Synopsis: Two people let a road rage incident burrow into their minds and slowly consume their every thought and action.

Title: The White Lotus
Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Coolidge, , Jon Gries, , F. Murray Abraham, , Adam DiMarco
Synopsis: The exploits of various guests and employees of a tropical resort over the span of a week.

Title: About My Father
Cast: Director:, Laura Terruso, | ,     Stars:, Robert De Niro, , Sebastian Maniscalco, , Leslie Bibb, , Kim Cattrall
Synopsis: When Sebastian tells his old-school Italian immigrant father Salvo that he is going to propose to his all-American girlfriend, Salvo insists on crashing a weekend with her tony parents.

Title: White Men Can't Jump
Cast: Director:, Calmatic, | ,     Stars:, Sinqua Walls, , Jack Harlow, , Lance Reddick, , Teyana Taylor
Synopsis: A remake of the 1992 film about a pair of basketball hustlers who team up to earn extra cash.

Title: Modern Family
Cast: Stars:, Ed O'Neill, , Sofía Vergara, , Julie Bowen, , Ty Burrell
Synopsis: Three different but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.

Title: Fool's Paradise
Cast: Director:, Charlie Day, | ,     Stars:, Charlie Day, , Ken Jeong, , Kate Beckinsale, , Adrien Brody
Synopsis: A fool for love becomes an accidental celebrity only to lose it all.

Title: Suits
Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Macht, , Patrick J. Adams, , Meghan Markle, , Sarah Rafferty
Synopsis: On the run from a drug deal gone bad, brilliant college dropout Mike Ross finds himself working with Harvey Specter, one of New York City's best lawyers.

Title: BlackBerry
Cast: Director:, Matt Johnson, | ,     Stars:, Jay Baruchel, , Glenn Howerton, , Matt Johnson, , Kelly Van der Burg
Synopsis: The story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone.

Title: The Big Bang Theory
Cast: Stars:, Johnny Galecki, , Jim Parsons, , Kaley Cuoco, , Simon Helberg
Synopsis: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

Title: One Piece
Cast: Stars:, Mayumi Tanaka, , Laurent Vernin, , Tony Beck, , Akemi Okamura
Synopsis: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger. The famous mystery treasure named "One Piece".

Title: Friends
Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Aniston, , Courteney Cox, , Lisa Kudrow, , Matt LeBlanc
Synopsis: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty year-old friends living in the Manhattan borough of New York City.

Title: Dave
Cast: Stars:, Dave Burd, , Andrew Santino, , Gata, , Taylor Misiak
Synopsis: A neurotic mid-20s suburbanite's convinced he's destined to be one of the greatest rappers of all time. Now he's got to prove it to everyone else.

Title: The Year I Started Masturbating
Cast: Director:, Erika Wasserman, | ,     Stars:, Katia Winter, , Jesper Zuschlag, , Henrik Dorsin, , Nour El-Refai
Synopsis: Goal-oriented Hanna wants another child before it is too late, but unexpectedly her boyfriend breaks up with her, and Hanna's world collapses. Hanna begins to realize that she may be chasing the wrong things in life.

Title: Somebody Somewhere
Cast: Stars:, Bridget Everett, , Jeff Hiller, , Mary Catherine Garrison, , Murray Hill
Synopsis: Sam is a true Kansan on the surface, but, beneath it all, struggles to fit the hometown mould. Grappling with loss and acceptance, she discovers herself and a community of outsiders who don't fit in but don't give up.

Title: Renfield
Cast: Director:, Chris McKay, | ,     Stars:, Nicholas Hoult, , Nicolas Cage, , Awkwafina, , Ben Schwartz
Synopsis: Renfield, Dracula's henchman and inmate at the lunatic asylum for decades, longs for a life away from the Count, his various demands, and all of the bloodshed that comes with them.

Title: Bones
Cast: Stars:, Emily Deschanel, , David Boreanaz, , Michaela Conlin, , T.J. Thyne
Synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.

Title: Shrinking
Cast: Stars:, Jason Segel, , Jessica Williams, , Harrison Ford, , Luke Tennie
Synopsis: A grieving therapist starts to tell his clients exactly what he thinks. Ignoring his training and ethics, he finds himself making huge changes to people's lives - including his own.

Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Cast: Directors:, Daniel Kwan, , Daniel Scheinert, | ,     Stars:, Michelle Yeoh, , Stephanie Hsu, , Jamie Lee Curtis, , Ke Huy Quan
Synopsis: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.

Title: Beau Is Afraid
Cast: Director:, Ari Aster, | ,     Stars:, Joaquin Phoenix, , Patti LuPone, , Amy Ryan, , Nathan Lane
Synopsis: Following the sudden death of his mother, a mild-mannered but anxiety-ridden man confronts his darkest fears as he embarks on an epic, Kafkaesque odyssey back home.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Vin Diesel, , Bradley Cooper, , Zoe Saldana
Synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

Title: I'm a Virgo
Cast: Stars:, Brett Gray, , Rachel Thurow, , Varsha Chand, , Lindsey G. Smith
Synopsis: A coming-of-age joyride about Cootie, a 13-foot-tall man, who escapes to experience the beauty and contradictions of the real world; he forms friendships, finds love, navigates awkward situations, and encounters his idol named The Hero.

Title: You Hurt My Feelings
Cast: Director:, Nicole Holofcener, | ,     Stars:, Julia Louis-Dreyfus, , Tobias Menzies, , Michaela Watkins, , Arian Moayed
Synopsis: A novelist's longstanding marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband giving his honest reaction to her latest book.

Title: Succession
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Snook, , Nicholas Braun, , Brian Cox, , Kieran Culkin
Synopsis: The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.

Title: Ted Lasso
Cast: Stars:, Jason Sudeikis, , Brett Goldstein, , Brendan Hunt, , Nick Mohammed
Synopsis: American college football coach Ted Lasso heads to London to manage AFC Richmond, a struggling English Premier League football team.

Title: Barry
Cast: Stars:, Bill Hader, , Stephen Root, , Sarah Goldberg, , Anthony Carrigan
Synopsis: A hit man from the Midwest moves to Los Angeles and gets caught up in the city's theatre arts scene.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Chukwudi Iwuji, , Bradley Cooper, , Pom Klementieff
Synopsis: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own - a mission that could mean the end of the Guardians if not successful.

Title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
Cast: Directors:, John Francis Daley, , Jonathan Goldstein, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pine, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Regé-Jean Page, , Justice Smith
Synopsis: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers embark on an epic quest to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.

Title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
Cast: Directors:, Aaron Horvath, , Michael Jelenic, , Pierre Leduc, , Fabien Polack, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Anya Taylor-Joy, , Charlie Day, , Jack Black
Synopsis: A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth with his brother, Luigi, trying to save a captured princess.

Title: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel
Cast: Stars:, Rachel Brosnahan, , Alex Borstein, , Michael Zegen, , Marin Hinkle
Synopsis: After her husband leaves her, young mother of two Miriam "Midge" Maisel discovers that she has a talent for stand-up comedy. Could this be her calling?

Title: The Machine
Cast: Director:, Peter Atencio, | ,     Stars:, Bert Kreischer, , Mark Hamill, , Jimmy Tatro, , Iva Babic
Synopsis: Bert's drunken past catches up with him 20 years down the road when he and his father are kidnapped by those Bert wronged 20 years ago while drunk on a college semester abroad in Russia.

Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Bob Persichetti, , Peter Ramsey, , Rodney Rothman, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Jake Johnson, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Mahershala Ali
Synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
Cast: Director:, David F. Sandberg, | ,     Stars:, Zachary Levi, , Asher Angel, , Jack Dylan Grazer, , Rachel Zegler
Synopsis: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania

Synopsis: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne are dragged into the Quantum Realm, along with Hope's parents and Scott's daughter Cassie. Together they must find a way to escape, but what secrets is Hope's mother hiding? And who is the mysterious Kang?

Synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

Title: I'm a Virgo

Synopsis: A coming-of-age joyride about Cootie, a 13-foot-tall man, who escapes to experience the beauty and contradictions of the real world; he forms friendships, finds love, navigates awkward situations, and encounters his idol named The Hero.

Synopsis: A novelist's longstanding marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband giving his honest reaction to her latest book.

Synopsis: American college football coach Ted Lasso heads to London to manage AFC Richmond, a struggling English Premier League football team.

Title: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel
Cast: Stars:, Rachel Brosnahan, , Alex Borstein, , Michael Zegen, , Marin Hinkle
Synopsis: After her husband leaves her, young mother of two Miriam "Midge" Maisel discovers that she has a talent for stand-up comedy. Could this be her calling?

Title: The Machine
Cast: Director:, Peter Atencio, | ,     Stars:, Bert Kreischer, , Mark Hamill, , Jimmy Tatro, , Iva Babic
Synopsis: Bert's drunken past catches up with him 20 years down the road when he and his father are kidnapped by those Bert wronged 20 years ago while drunk on a college semester abroad in Russia.

Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Bob Persichetti, , Peter Ramsey, , Rodney Rothman, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Jake Johnson, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Mahershala Ali
Synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
Cast: Director:, David F. Sandberg, | ,     Stars:, Zachary Levi, , Asher Angel, , Jack Dylan Grazer, , Rachel Zegler
Synopsis: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
Cast: Director:, Peyton Reed, | ,     Stars:, Paul Rudd, , Evangeline Lilly, , Michael Douglas, , Michelle Pfeiffer
Synopsis: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne are dragged into the Quantum Realm, along with Hope's parents and Scott's daughter Cassie. Together they must find a way to escape, but what secrets is Hope's mother hiding? And who is the mysterious Kang?

Title: American Born Chinese
Cast: Stars:, Ben Wang, , Yann Yann Yeo, , Chin Han, , Jimmy Liu
Synopsis: Jin Wang is an average teenager balancing high school and home life. When he meets a new foreign student on the first day of the school, even more worlds collide as Jin is unwittingly entangled in a battle with Chinese mythological gods.

Title: Asteroid City
Cast: Director:, Wes Anderson, | ,     Stars:, Jason Schwartzman, , Scarlett Johansson, , Tom Hanks, , Jeffrey Wright
Synopsis: The itinerary of a Junior Stargazer convention is spectacularly disrupted by world-changing events.

Title: Platonic
Cast: Stars:, Rose Byrne, , Seth Rogen, , Tre Hale, , Andrew Lopez
Synopsis: Former childhood best friends reconnect as adults and try to get past the rift that led to their falling out.

Title: I Think You Should Leave with Tim Robinson
Cast: Stars:, Tim Robinson, , Sam Richardson, , Patti Harrison, , Conner O'Malley
Synopsis: A sketch show where Tim Robinson and his guests spend each segment driving someone to the point of needing -- or desperately wanting -- to leave.

Title: A Man Called Otto
Cast: Director:, Marc Forster, | ,     Stars:, Tom Hanks, , Mariana Treviño, , Rachel Keller, , John Higgins
Synopsis: Otto is a grump who's given up on life following the loss of his wife and wants to end it all. When a young family moves in nearby, he meets his match in quick-witted Marisol, leading to a friendship that will turn his world around.

Title: Jury Duty
Cast: Stars:, James Marsden, , Alan Barinholtz, , Susan Berger, , Cassandra Blair
Synopsis: It follows the workings of an American jury trial through the eyes of Ronald Gladden, a juror who is unaware the entire case is fake. Everyone except him is an actor, and everything that happens is carefully planned.

Title: Young Sheldon
Cast: Stars:, Iain Armitage, , Zoe Perry, , Lance Barber, , Montana Jordan
Synopsis: Meet a child genius named Sheldon Cooper (already seen as an adult in The Big Bang Theory (2007)) and his family. Some unique challenges face Sheldon, who is socially impaired.

Title: XO, Kitty
Cast: Stars:, Anna Cathcart, , Minyeong Choi, , Gia Kim, , Sang Heon Lee
Synopsis: A new love story unfolds when teen matchmaker Kitty reunites with her long-distance boyfriend at the same boarding school attended by her late mother.

Title: The Boys
Cast: Stars:, Karl Urban, , Jack Quaid, , Antony Starr, , Erin Moriarty
Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: Shameless
Cast: Stars:, Emmy Rossum, , William H. Macy, , Ethan Cutkosky, , Jeremy Allen White
Synopsis: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

Title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
Cast: Stars:, Charlie Day, , Rob McElhenney, , Kaitlin Olson, , Glenn Howerton
Synopsis: Five friends with big egos and small brains are the proprietors of an Irish pub in Philadelphia.

Title: The Office
Cast: Stars:, Steve Carell, , Jenna Fischer, , John Krasinski, , Rainn Wilson
Synopsis: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

Title: Poker Face
Cast: Stars:, Natasha Lyonne, , Benjamin Bratt, , Simon Helberg, , Pedro Hollywood
Synopsis: Charlie has an extraordinary ability to determine when someone is lying. She hits the road with her Plymouth Barracuda and with every stop encounters a new cast of characters and strange crimes she can't help but investigate and solve.

Title: Beef

Synopsis: Two people let a road rage incident burrow into their minds and slowly consume their every thought and action.

Synopsis: The exploits of various guests and employees of a tropical resort over the span of a week.

Synopsis: When Sebastian tells his old-school Italian immigrant father Salvo that he is going to propose to his all-American girlfriend, Salvo insists on crashing a weekend with her tony parents.

Synopsis: A remake of the 1992 film about a pair of basketball hustlers who team up to earn extra cash.

Cast: Stars:, Ed O'Neill, , Sofía Vergara, , Julie Bowen, , Ty Burrell
Synopsis: Three different but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.

Synopsis: A fool for love becomes an accidental celebrity only to lose it all.

Synopsis: A neurotic mid-20s suburbanite's convinced he's destined to be one of the greatest rappers of all time. Now he's got to prove it to everyone else.

Title: The Year I Started Masturbating
Cast: Director:, Erika Wasserman, | ,     Stars:, Katia Winter, , Jesper Zuschlag, , Henrik Dorsin, , Nour El-Refai
Synopsis: Goal-oriented Hanna wants another child before it is too late, but unexpectedly her boyfriend breaks up with her, and Hanna's world collapses. Hanna begins to realize that she may be chasing the wrong things in life.

Title: Somebody Somewhere
Cast: Stars:, Bridget Everett, , Jeff Hiller, , Mary Catherine Garrison, , Murray Hill
Synopsis: Sam is a true Kansan on the surface, but, beneath it all, struggles to fit the hometown mould. Grappling with loss and acceptance, she discovers herself and a community of outsiders who don't fit in but don't give up.

Title: Renfield
Cast: Director:, Chris McKay, | ,     Stars:, Nicholas Hoult, , Nicolas Cage, , Awkwafina, , Ben Schwartz
Synopsis: Renfield, Dracula's henchman and inmate at the lunatic asylum for decades, longs for a life away from the Count, his various demands, and all of the bloodshed that comes with them.

Title: Bones
Cast: Stars:, Emily Deschanel, , David Boreanaz, , Michaela Conlin, , T.J. Thyne
Synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.

Title: Shrinking
Cast: Stars:, Jason Segel, , Jessica Williams, , Harrison Ford, , Luke Tennie
Synopsis: A grieving therapist starts to tell his clients exactly what he thinks. Ignoring his training and ethics, he finds himself making huge changes to people's lives - including his own.

Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Cast: Directors:, Daniel Kwan, , Daniel Scheinert, | ,     Stars:, Michelle Yeoh, , Stephanie Hsu, , Jamie Lee Curtis, , Ke Huy Quan
Synopsis: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.

Title: Beau Is Afraid
Cast: Director:, Ari Aster, | ,     Stars:, Joaquin Phoenix, , Patti LuPone, , Amy Ryan, , Nathan Lane
Synopsis: Following the sudden death of his mother, a mild-mannered but anxiety-ridden man confronts his darkest fears as he embarks on an epic, Kafkaesque odyssey back home.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Vin Diesel, , Bradley Cooper, , Zoe Saldana
Synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

Title: I'm a Virgo
Cast: Stars:, Brett Gray, , Rachel Thurow, , Varsha Chand, , Lindsey G. Smith
Synopsis: A coming-of-age joyride about Cootie, a 13-foot-tall man, who escapes to experience the beauty and contradictions of the real world; he forms friendships, finds love, navigates awkward situations, and encounters his idol named The Hero.

Title: You Hurt My Feelings
Cast: Director:, Nicole Holofcener, | ,     Stars:, Julia Louis-Dreyfus, , Tobias Menzies, , Michaela Watkins, , Arian Moayed
Synopsis: A novelist's longstanding marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband giving his honest reaction to her latest book.

Title: Succession
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Snook, , Nicholas Braun, , Brian Cox, , Kieran Culkin
Synopsis: The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.

Title: Ted Lasso
Cast: Stars:, Jason Sudeikis, , Brett Goldstein, , Brendan Hunt, , Nick Mohammed
Synopsis: American college football coach Ted Lasso heads to London to manage AFC Richmond, a struggling English Premier League football team.

Title: Barry
Cast: Stars:, Bill Hader, , Stephen Root, , Sarah Goldberg, , Anthony Carrigan
Synopsis: A hit man from the Midwest moves to Los Angeles and gets caught up in the city's theatre arts scene.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Chukwudi Iwuji, , Bradley Cooper, , Pom Klementieff
Synopsis: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own - a mission that could mean the end of the Guardians if not successful.

Title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
Cast: Directors:, John Francis Daley, , Jonathan Goldstein, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pine, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Regé-Jean Page, , Justice Smith
Synopsis: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers embark on an epic quest to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.

Title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
Cast: Directors:, Aaron Horvath, , Michael Jelenic, , Pierre Leduc, , Fabien Polack, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Anya Taylor-Joy, , Charlie Day, , Jack Black
Synopsis: A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth with his brother, Luigi, trying to save a captured princess.

Title: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel
Cast: Stars:, Rachel Brosnahan, , Alex Borstein, , Michael Zegen, , Marin Hinkle
Synopsis: After her husband leaves her, young mother of two Miriam "Midge" Maisel discovers that she has a talent for stand-up comedy. Could this be her calling?

Title: The Machine
Cast: Director:, Peter Atencio, | ,     Stars:, Bert Kreischer, , Mark Hamill, , Jimmy Tatro, , Iva Babic
Synopsis: Bert's drunken past catches up with him 20 years down the road when he and his father are kidnapped by those Bert wronged 20 years ago while drunk on a college semester abroad in Russia.

Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Bob Persichetti, , Peter Ramsey, , Rodney Rothman, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Jake Johnson, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Mahershala Ali
Synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
Cast: Director:, David F. Sandberg, | ,     Stars:, Zachary Levi, , Asher Angel, , Jack Dylan Grazer, , Rachel Zegler
Synopsis: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
Cast: Director:, Peyton Reed, | ,     Stars:, Paul Rudd, , Evangeline Lilly, , Michael Douglas, , Michelle Pfeiffer
Synopsis: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne are dragged into the Quantum Realm, along with Hope's parents and Scott's daughter Cassie. Together they must find a way to escape, but what secrets is Hope's mother hiding? And who is the mysterious Kang?

Title: American Born Chinese
Cast: Stars:, Ben Wang, , Yann Yann Yeo, , Chin Han, , Jimmy Liu
Synopsis: Jin Wang is an average teenager balancing high school and home life. When he meets a new foreign student on the first day of the school, even more worlds collide as Jin is unwittingly entangled in a battle with Chinese mythological gods.

Title: Asteroid City
Cast: Director:, Wes Anderson, | ,     Stars:, Jason Schwartzman, , Scarlett Johansson, , Tom Hanks, , Jeffrey Wright
Synopsis: The itinerary of a Junior Stargazer convention is spectacularly disrupted by world-changing events.

Title: Platonic
Cast: Stars:, Rose Byrne, , Seth Rogen, , Tre Hale, , Andrew Lopez
Synopsis: Former childhood best friends reconnect as adults and try to get past the rift that led to their falling out.

Title: I Think You Should Leave with Tim Robinson
Cast: Stars:, Tim Robinson, , Sam Richardson, , Patti Harrison, , Conner O'Malley
Synopsis: A sketch show where Tim Robinson and his guests spend each segment driving someone to the point of needing -- or desperately wanting -- to leave.

Title: A Man Called Otto
Cast: Director:, Marc Forster, | ,     Stars:, Tom Hanks, , Mariana Treviño, , Rachel Keller, , John Higgins
Synopsis: Otto is a grump who's given up on life following the loss of his wife and wants to end it all. When a young family moves in nearby, he meets his match in quick-witted Marisol, leading to a friendship that will turn his world around.

Title: Jury Duty
Cast: Stars:, James Marsden, , Alan Barinholtz, , Susan Berger, , Cassandra Blair
Synopsis: It follows the workings of an American jury trial through the eyes of Ronald Gladden, a juror who is unaware the entire case is fake. Everyone except him is an actor, and everything that happens is carefully planned.

Title: Young Sheldon
Cast: Stars:, Iain Armitage, , Zoe Perry, , Lance Barber, , Montana Jordan
Synopsis: Meet a child genius named Sheldon Cooper (already seen as an adult in The Big Bang Theory (2007)) and his family. Some unique challenges face Sheldon, who is socially impaired.

Title: XO, Kitty
Cast: Stars:, Anna Cathcart, , Minyeong Choi, , Gia Kim, , Sang Heon Lee
Synopsis: A new love story unfolds when teen matchmaker Kitty reunites with her long-distance boyfriend at the same boarding school attended by her late mother.

Title: The Boys
Cast: Stars:, Karl Urban, , Jack Quaid, , Antony Starr, , Erin Moriarty
Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: Shameless
Cast: Stars:, Emmy Rossum, , William H. Macy, , Ethan Cutkosky, , Jeremy Allen White
Synopsis: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

Title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
Cast: Stars:, Charlie Day, , Rob McElhenney, , Kaitlin Olson, , Glenn Howerton
Synopsis: Five friends with big egos and small brains are the proprietors of an Irish pub in Philadelphia.

Title: The Office
Cast: Stars:, Steve Carell, , Jenna Fischer, , John Krasinski, , Rainn Wilson
Synopsis: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

Title: Poker Face
Cast: Stars:, Natasha Lyonne, , Benjamin Bratt, , Simon Helberg, , Pedro Hollywood
Synopsis: Charlie has an extraordinary ability to determine when someone is lying. She hits the road with her Plymouth Barracuda and with every stop encounters a new cast of characters and strange crimes she can't help but investigate and solve.

Title: Beef
Cast: Stars:, Steven Yeun, , Ali Wong, , Joseph Lee, , Young Mazino
Synopsis: Two people let a road rage incident burrow into their minds and slowly consume their every thought and action.

Title: The White Lotus
Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Coolidge, , Jon Gries, , F. Murray Abraham, , Adam DiMarco
Synopsis: The exploits of various guests and employees of a tropical resort over the span of a week.

Title: About My Father
Cast: Director:, Laura Terruso, | ,     Stars:, Robert De Niro, , Sebastian Maniscalco, , Leslie Bibb, , Kim Cattrall
Synopsis: When Sebastian tells his old-school Italian immigrant father Salvo that he is going to propose to his all-American girlfriend, Salvo insists on crashing a weekend with her tony parents.

Title: White Men Can't Jump
Cast: Director:, Calmatic, | ,     Stars:, Sinqua Walls, , Jack Harlow, , Lance Reddick, , Teyana Taylor
Synopsis: A remake of the 1992 film about a pair of basketball hustlers who team up to earn extra cash.

Title: Modern Family
Cast: Stars:, Ed O'Neill, , Sofía Vergara, , Julie Bowen, , Ty Burrell
Synopsis: Three different but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.

Title: Fool's Paradise
Cast: Director:, Charlie Day, | ,     Stars:, Charlie Day, , Ken Jeong, , Kate Beckinsale, , Adrien Brody
Synopsis: A fool for love becomes an accidental celebrity only to lose it all.

Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Macht, , Patrick J. Adams, , Meghan Markle, , Sarah Rafferty

Synopsis: A coming-of-age joyride about Cootie, a 13-foot-tall man, who escapes to experience the beauty and contradictions of the real world; he forms friendships, finds love, navigates awkward situations, and encounters his idol named The Hero.

Title: You Hurt My Feelings
Cast: Director:, Nicole Holofcener, | ,     Stars:, Julia Louis-Dreyfus, , Tobias Menzies, , Michaela Watkins, , Arian Moayed
Synopsis: A novelist's longstanding marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband giving his honest reaction to her latest book.

Title: Succession
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Snook, , Nicholas Braun, , Brian Cox, , Kieran Culkin
Synopsis: The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.

Title: Ted Lasso
Cast: Stars:, Jason Sudeikis, , Brett Goldstein, , Brendan Hunt, , Nick Mohammed
Synopsis: American college football coach Ted Lasso heads to London to manage AFC Richmond, a struggling English Premier League football team.

Title: Barry
Cast: Stars:, Bill Hader, , Stephen Root, , Sarah Goldberg, , Anthony Carrigan
Synopsis: A hit man from the Midwest moves to Los Angeles and gets caught up in the city's theatre arts scene.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Chukwudi Iwuji, , Bradley Cooper, , Pom Klementieff
Synopsis: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own - a mission that could mean the end of the Guardians if not successful.

Title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
Cast: Directors:, John Francis Daley, , Jonathan Goldstein, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pine, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Regé-Jean Page, , Justice Smith
Synopsis: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers embark on an epic quest to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.

Title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
Cast: Directors:, Aaron Horvath, , Michael Jelenic, , Pierre Leduc, , Fabien Polack, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Anya Taylor-Joy, , Charlie Day, , Jack Black
Synopsis: A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth with his brother, Luigi, trying to save a captured princess.

Title: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel
Cast: Stars:, Rachel Brosnahan, , Alex Borstein, , Michael Zegen, , Marin Hinkle
Synopsis: After her husband leaves her, young mother of two Miriam "Midge" Maisel discovers that she has a talent for stand-up comedy. Could this be her calling?

Title: The Machine
Cast: Director:, Peter Atencio, | ,     Stars:, Bert Kreischer, , Mark Hamill, , Jimmy Tatro, , Iva Babic
Synopsis: Bert's drunken past catches up with him 20 years down the road when he and his father are kidnapped by those Bert wronged 20 years ago while drunk on a college semester abroad in Russia.

Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Bob Persichetti, , Peter Ramsey, , Rodney Rothman, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Jake Johnson, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Mahershala Ali
Synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
Cast: Director:, David F. Sandberg, | ,     Stars:, Zachary Levi, , Asher Angel, , Jack Dylan Grazer, , Rachel Zegler
Synopsis: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
Cast: Director:, Peyton Reed, | ,     Stars:, Paul Rudd, , Evangeline Lilly, , Michael Douglas, , Michelle Pfeiffer
Synopsis: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne are dragged into the Quantum Realm, along with Hope's parents and Scott's daughter Cassie. Together they must find a way to escape, but what secrets is Hope's mother hiding? And who is the mysterious Kang?

Title: American Born Chinese
Cast: Stars:, Ben Wang, , Yann Yann Yeo, , Chin Han, , Jimmy Liu
Synopsis: Jin Wang is an average teenager balancing high school and home life. When he meets a new foreign student on the first day of the school, even more worlds collide as Jin is unwittingly entangled in a battle with Chinese mythological gods.

Title: Asteroid City
Cast: Director:, Wes Anderson, | ,     Stars:, Jason Schwartzman, , Scarlett Johansson, , Tom Hanks, , Jeffrey Wright
Synopsis: The itinerary of a Junior Stargazer convention is spectacularly disrupted by world-changing events.

Title: Platonic
Cast: Stars:, Rose Byrne, , Seth Rogen, , Tre Hale, , Andrew Lopez
Synopsis: Former childhood best friends reconnect as adults and try to get past the rift that led to their falling out.

Title: I Think You Should Leave with Tim Robinson
Cast: Stars:, Tim Robinson, , Sam Richardson, , Patti Harrison, , Conner O'Malley
Synopsis: A sketch show where Tim Robinson and his guests spend each segment driving someone to the point of needing -- or desperately wanting -- to leave.

Title: A Man Called Otto
Cast: Director:, Marc Forster, | ,     Stars:, Tom Hanks, , Mariana Treviño, , Rachel Keller, , John Higgins
Synopsis: Otto is a grump who's given up on life following the loss of his wife and wants to end it all. When a young family moves in nearby, he meets his match in quick-witted Marisol, leading to a friendship that will turn his world around.

Title: Jury Duty
Cast: Stars:, James Marsden, , Alan Barinholtz, , Susan Berger, , Cassandra Blair
Synopsis: It follows the workings of an American jury trial through the eyes of Ronald Gladden, a juror who is unaware the entire case is fake. Everyone except him is an actor, and everything that happens is carefully planned.

Title: Young Sheldon
Cast: Stars:, Iain Armitage, , Zoe Perry, , Lance Barber, , Montana Jordan
Synopsis: Meet a child genius named Sheldon Cooper (already seen as an adult in The Big Bang Theory (2007)) and his family. Some unique challenges face Sheldon, who is socially impaired.

Title: XO, Kitty
Cast: Stars:, Anna Cathcart, , Minyeong Choi, , Gia Kim, , Sang Heon Lee
Synopsis: A new love story unfolds when teen matchmaker Kitty reunites with her long-distance boyfriend at the same boarding school attended by her late mother.

Title: The Boys
Cast: Stars:, Karl Urban, , Jack Quaid, , Antony Starr, , Erin Moriarty
Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: Shameless
Cast: Stars:, Emmy Rossum, , William H. Macy, , Ethan Cutkosky, , Jeremy Allen White
Synopsis: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

Title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
Cast: Stars:, Charlie Day, , Rob McElhenney, , Kaitlin Olson, , Glenn Howerton
Synopsis: Five friends with big egos and small brains are the proprietors of an Irish pub in Philadelphia.

Title: The Office
Cast: Stars:, Steve Carell, , Jenna Fischer, , John Krasinski, , Rainn Wilson
Synopsis: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

Title: Poker Face
Cast: Stars:, Natasha Lyonne, , Benjamin Bratt, , Simon Helberg, , Pedro Hollywood
Synopsis: Charlie has an extraordinary ability to determine when someone is lying. She hits the road with her Plymouth Barracuda and with every stop encounters a new cast of characters and strange crimes she can't help but investigate and solve.

Title: Beef
Cast: Stars:, Steven Yeun, , Ali Wong, , Joseph Lee, , Young Mazino
Synopsis: Two people let a road rage incident burrow into their minds and slowly consume their every thought and action.

Title: The White Lotus
Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Coolidge, , Jon Gries, , F. Murray Abraham, , Adam DiMarco
Synopsis: The exploits of various guests and employees of a tropical resort over the span of a week.

Title: About My Father
Cast: Director:, Laura Terruso, | ,     Stars:, Robert De Niro, , Sebastian Maniscalco, , Leslie Bibb, , Kim Cattrall
Synopsis: When Sebastian tells his old-school Italian immigrant father Salvo that he is going to propose to his all-American girlfriend, Salvo insists on crashing a weekend with her tony parents.

Title: White Men Can't Jump
Cast: Director:, Calmatic, | ,     Stars:, Sinqua Walls, , Jack Harlow, , Lance Reddick, , Teyana Taylor
Synopsis: A remake of the 1992 film about a pair of basketball hustlers who team up to earn extra cash.

Title: Modern Family
Cast: Stars:, Ed O'Neill, , Sofía Vergara, , Julie Bowen, , Ty Burrell
Synopsis: Three different but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.

Title: Fool's Paradise
Cast: Director:, Charlie Day, | ,     Stars:, Charlie Day, , Ken Jeong, , Kate Beckinsale, , Adrien Brody
Synopsis: A fool for love becomes an accidental celebrity only to lose it all.

Title: Suits
Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Macht, , Patrick J. Adams, , Meghan Markle, , Sarah Rafferty
Synopsis: On the run from a drug deal gone bad, brilliant college dropout Mike Ross finds himself working with Harvey Specter, one of New York City's best lawyers.

Title: BlackBerry
Cast: Director:, Matt Johnson, | ,     Stars:, Jay Baruchel, , Glenn Howerton, , Matt Johnson, , Kelly Van der Burg
Synopsis: The story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone.

Title: The Big Bang Theory
Cast: Stars:, Johnny Galecki, , Jim Parsons, , Kaley Cuoco, , Simon Helberg
Synopsis: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

Title: One Piece
Cast: Stars:, Mayumi Tanaka, , Laurent Vernin, , Tony Beck, , Akemi Okamura
Synopsis: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger. The famous mystery treasure named "One Piece".

Title: Friends
Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Aniston, , Courteney Cox, , Lisa Kudrow, , Matt LeBlanc
Synopsis: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty year-old friends living in the Manhattan borough of New York City.

Title: Dave
Cast: Stars:, Dave Burd, , Andrew Santino, , Gata, , Taylor Misiak
Synopsis: A neurotic mid-20s suburbanite's convinced he's destined to be one of the greatest rappers of all time. Now he's got to prove it to everyone else.

Title: The Year I Started Masturbating
Cast: Director:, Erika Wasserman, | ,     Stars:, Katia Winter, , Jesper Zuschlag, , Henrik Dorsin, , Nour El-Refai
Synopsis: Goal-oriented Hanna wants another child before it is too late, but unexpectedly her boyfriend breaks up with her, and Hanna's world collapses. Hanna begins to realize that she may be chasing the wrong things in life.

Title: Somebody Somewhere
Cast: Stars:, Bridget Everett, , Jeff Hiller, , Mary Catherine Garrison, , Murray Hill
Synopsis: Sam is a true Kansan on the surface, but, beneath it all, struggles to fit the hometown mould. Grappling with loss and acceptance, she discovers herself and a community of outsiders who don't fit in but don't give up.

Title: Renfield
Cast: Director:, Chris McKay, | ,     Stars:, Nicholas Hoult, , Nicolas Cage, , Awkwafina, , Ben Schwartz
Synopsis: Renfield, Dracula's henchman and inmate at the lunatic asylum for decades, longs for a life away from the Count, his various demands, and all of the bloodshed that comes with them.

Synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.

Synopsis: A grieving therapist starts to tell his clients exactly what he thinks. Ignoring his training and ethics, he finds himself making huge changes to people's lives - including his own.

Synopsis: Sam is a true Kansan on the surface, but, beneath it all, struggles to fit the hometown mould. Grappling with loss and acceptance, she discovers herself and a community of outsiders who don't fit in but don't give up.

Title: Renfield
Cast: Director:, Chris McKay, | ,     Stars:, Nicholas Hoult, , Nicolas Cage, , Awkwafina, , Ben Schwartz
Synopsis: Renfield, Dracula's henchman and inmate at the lunatic asylum for decades, longs for a life away from the Count, his various demands, and all of the bloodshed that comes with them.

Title: Bones
Cast: Stars:, Emily Deschanel, , David Boreanaz, , Michaela Conlin, , T.J. Thyne
Synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.

Title: Shrinking
Cast: Stars:, Jason Segel, , Jessica Williams, , Harrison Ford, , Luke Tennie
Synopsis: A grieving therapist starts to tell his clients exactly what he thinks. Ignoring his training and ethics, he finds himself making huge changes to people's lives - including his own.

Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Cast: Directors:, Daniel Kwan, , Daniel Scheinert, | ,     Stars:, Michelle Yeoh, , Stephanie Hsu, , Jamie Lee Curtis, , Ke Huy Quan
Synopsis: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.

Title: Beau Is Afraid
Cast: Director:, Ari Aster, | ,     Stars:, Joaquin Phoenix, , Patti LuPone, , Amy Ryan, , Nathan Lane
Synopsis: Following the sudden death of his mother, a mild-mannered but anxiety-ridden man confronts his darkest fears as he embarks on an epic, Kafkaesque odyssey back home.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Vin Diesel, , Bradley Cooper, , Zoe Saldana
Synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

Title: I'm a Virgo
Cast: Stars:, Brett Gray, , Rachel Thurow, , Varsha Chand, , Lindsey G. Smith
Synopsis: A coming-of-age joyride about Cootie, a 13-foot-tall man, who escapes to experience the beauty and contradictions of the real world; he forms friendships, finds love, navigates awkward situations, and encounters his idol named The Hero.

Title: You Hurt My Feelings
Cast: Director:, Nicole Holofcener, | ,     Stars:, Julia Louis-Dreyfus, , Tobias Menzies, , Michaela Watkins, , Arian Moayed
Synopsis: A novelist's longstanding marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband giving his honest reaction to her latest book.

Title: Succession
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Snook, , Nicholas Braun, , Brian Cox, , Kieran Culkin
Synopsis: The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.

Title: Ted Lasso
Cast: Stars:, Jason Sudeikis, , Brett Goldstein, , Brendan Hunt, , Nick Mohammed
Synopsis: American college football coach Ted Lasso heads to London to manage AFC Richmond, a struggling English Premier League football team.

Title: Barry
Cast: Stars:, Bill Hader, , Stephen Root, , Sarah Goldberg, , Anthony Carrigan
Synopsis: A hit man from the Midwest moves to Los Angeles and gets caught up in the city's theatre arts scene.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Chukwudi Iwuji, , Bradley Cooper, , Pom Klementieff
Synopsis: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own - a mission that could mean the end of the Guardians if not successful.

Title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
Cast: Directors:, John Francis Daley, , Jonathan Goldstein, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pine, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Regé-Jean Page, , Justice Smith
Synopsis: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers embark on an epic quest to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.

Title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
Cast: Directors:, Aaron Horvath, , Michael Jelenic, , Pierre Leduc, , Fabien Polack, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Anya Taylor-Joy, , Charlie Day, , Jack Black
Synopsis: A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth with his brother, Luigi, trying to save a captured princess.

Title: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel
Cast: Stars:, Rachel Brosnahan, , Alex Borstein, , Michael Zegen, , Marin Hinkle
Synopsis: After her husband leaves her, young mother of two Miriam "Midge" Maisel discovers that she has a talent for stand-up comedy. Could this be her calling?

Title: The Machine
Cast: Director:, Peter Atencio, | ,     Stars:, Bert Kreischer, , Mark Hamill, , Jimmy Tatro, , Iva Babic
Synopsis: Bert's drunken past catches up with him 20 years down the road when he and his father are kidnapped by those Bert wronged 20 years ago while drunk on a college semester abroad in Russia.

Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Bob Persichetti, , Peter Ramsey, , Rodney Rothman, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Jake Johnson, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Mahershala Ali
Synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
Cast: Director:, David F. Sandberg, | ,     Stars:, Zachary Levi, , Asher Angel, , Jack Dylan Grazer, , Rachel Zegler
Synopsis: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
Cast: Director:, Peyton Reed, | ,     Stars:, Paul Rudd, , Evangeline Lilly, , Michael Douglas, , Michelle Pfeiffer
Synopsis: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne are dragged into the Quantum Realm, along with Hope's parents and Scott's daughter Cassie. Together they must find a way to escape, but what secrets is Hope's mother hiding? And who is the mysterious Kang?

Title: American Born Chinese
Cast: Stars:, Ben Wang, , Yann Yann Yeo, , Chin Han, , Jimmy Liu
Synopsis: Jin Wang is an average teenager balancing high school and home life. When he meets a new foreign student on the first day of the school, even more worlds collide as Jin is unwittingly entangled in a battle with Chinese mythological gods.

Title: Asteroid City
Cast: Director:, Wes Anderson, | ,     Stars:, Jason Schwartzman, , Scarlett Johansson, , Tom Hanks, , Jeffrey Wright
Synopsis: The itinerary of a Junior Stargazer convention is spectacularly disrupted by world-changing events.

Title: Platonic
Cast: Stars:, Rose Byrne, , Seth Rogen, , Tre Hale, , Andrew Lopez
Synopsis: Former childhood best friends reconnect as adults and try to get past the rift that led to their falling out.

Title: I Think You Should Leave with Tim Robinson
Cast: Stars:, Tim Robinson, , Sam Richardson, , Patti Harrison, , Conner O'Malley
Synopsis: A sketch show where Tim Robinson and his guests spend each segment driving someone to the point of needing -- or desperately wanting -- to leave.

Title: A Man Called Otto
Cast: Director:, Marc Forster, | ,     Stars:, Tom Hanks, , Mariana Treviño, , Rachel Keller, , John Higgins
Synopsis: Otto is a grump who's given up on life following the loss of his wife and wants to end it all. When a young family moves in nearby, he meets his match in quick-witted Marisol, leading to a friendship that will turn his world around.

Title: Jury Duty
Cast: Stars:, James Marsden, , Alan Barinholtz, , Susan Berger, , Cassandra Blair
Synopsis: It follows the workings of an American jury trial through the eyes of Ronald Gladden, a juror who is unaware the entire case is fake. Everyone except him is an actor, and everything that happens is carefully planned.

Title: Young Sheldon
Cast: Stars:, Iain Armitage, , Zoe Perry, , Lance Barber, , Montana Jordan
Synopsis: Meet a child genius named Sheldon Cooper (already seen as an adult in The Big Bang Theory (2007)) and his family. Some unique challenges face Sheldon, who is socially impaired.

Title: XO, Kitty
Cast: Stars:, Anna Cathcart, , Minyeong Choi, , Gia Kim, , Sang Heon Lee
Synopsis: A new love story unfolds when teen matchmaker Kitty reunites with her long-distance boyfriend at the same boarding school attended by her late mother.

Title: The Boys
Cast: Stars:, Karl Urban, , Jack Quaid, , Antony Starr, , Erin Moriarty
Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: Shameless
Cast: Stars:, Emmy Rossum, , William H. Macy, , Ethan Cutkosky, , Jeremy Allen White
Synopsis: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

Title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
Cast: Stars:, Charlie Day, , Rob McElhenney, , Kaitlin Olson, , Glenn Howerton
Synopsis: Five friends with big egos and small brains are the proprietors of an Irish pub in Philadelphia.

Title: The Office
Cast: Stars:, Steve Carell, , Jenna Fischer, , John Krasinski, , Rainn Wilson
Synopsis: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

Title: Poker Face
Cast: Stars:, Natasha Lyonne, , Benjamin Bratt, , Simon Helberg, , Pedro Hollywood
Synopsis: Charlie has an extraordinary ability to determine when someone is lying. She hits the road with her Plymouth Barracuda and with every stop encounters a new cast of characters and strange crimes she can't help but investigate and solve.

Title: Beef
Cast: Stars:, Steven Yeun, , Ali Wong, , Joseph Lee, , Young Mazino
Synopsis: Two people let a road rage incident burrow into their minds and slowly consume their every thought and action.

Title: The White Lotus
Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Coolidge, , Jon Gries, , F. Murray Abraham, , Adam DiMarco
Synopsis: The exploits of various guests and employees of a tropical resort over the span of a week.

Title: About My Father
Cast: Director:, Laura Terruso, | ,     Stars:, Robert De Niro, , Sebastian Maniscalco, , Leslie Bibb, , Kim Cattrall
Synopsis: When Sebastian tells his old-school Italian immigrant father Salvo that he is going to propose to his all-American girlfriend, Salvo insists on crashing a weekend with her tony parents.

Title: White Men Can't Jump
Cast: Director:, Calmatic, | ,     Stars:, Sinqua Walls, , Jack Harlow, , Lance Reddick, , Teyana Taylor
Synopsis: A remake of the 1992 film about a pair of basketball hustlers who team up to earn extra cash.

Title: Modern Family
Cast: Stars:, Ed O'Neill, , Sofía Vergara, , Julie Bowen, , Ty Burrell
Synopsis: Three different but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.

Title: Fool's Paradise
Cast: Director:, Charlie Day, | ,     Stars:, Charlie Day, , Ken Jeong, , Kate Beckinsale, , Adrien Brody
Synopsis: A fool for love becomes an accidental celebrity only to lose it all.

Title: Suits
Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Macht, , Patrick J. Adams, , Meghan Markle, , Sarah Rafferty
Synopsis: On the run from a drug deal gone bad, brilliant college dropout Mike Ross finds himself working with Harvey Specter, one of New York City's best lawyers.

Synopsis: The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.

Title: Ted Lasso
Cast: Stars:, Jason Sudeikis, , Brett Goldstein, , Brendan Hunt, , Nick Mohammed
Synopsis: American college football coach Ted Lasso heads to London to manage AFC Richmond, a struggling English Premier League football team.

Title: Barry
Cast: Stars:, Bill Hader, , Stephen Root, , Sarah Goldberg, , Anthony Carrigan
Synopsis: A hit man from the Midwest moves to Los Angeles and gets caught up in the city's theatre arts scene.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Chukwudi Iwuji, , Bradley Cooper, , Pom Klementieff
Synopsis: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own - a mission that could mean the end of the Guardians if not successful.

Title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
Cast: Directors:, John Francis Daley, , Jonathan Goldstein, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pine, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Regé-Jean Page, , Justice Smith
Synopsis: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers embark on an epic quest to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.

Title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
Cast: Directors:, Aaron Horvath, , Michael Jelenic, , Pierre Leduc, , Fabien Polack, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Anya Taylor-Joy, , Charlie Day, , Jack Black
Synopsis: A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth with his brother, Luigi, trying to save a captured princess.

Title: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel
Cast: Stars:, Rachel Brosnahan, , Alex Borstein, , Michael Zegen, , Marin Hinkle
Synopsis: After her husband leaves her, young mother of two Miriam "Midge" Maisel discovers that she has a talent for stand-up comedy. Could this be her calling?

Title: The Machine
Cast: Director:, Peter Atencio, | ,     Stars:, Bert Kreischer, , Mark Hamill, , Jimmy Tatro, , Iva Babic
Synopsis: Bert's drunken past catches up with him 20 years down the road when he and his father are kidnapped by those Bert wronged 20 years ago while drunk on a college semester abroad in Russia.

Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Bob Persichetti, , Peter Ramsey, , Rodney Rothman, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Jake Johnson, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Mahershala Ali
Synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
Cast: Director:, David F. Sandberg, | ,     Stars:, Zachary Levi, , Asher Angel, , Jack Dylan Grazer, , Rachel Zegler
Synopsis: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
Cast: Director:, Peyton Reed, | ,     Stars:, Paul Rudd, , Evangeline Lilly, , Michael Douglas, , Michelle Pfeiffer
Synopsis: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne are dragged into the Quantum Realm, along with Hope's parents and Scott's daughter Cassie. Together they must find a way to escape, but what secrets is Hope's mother hiding? And who is the mysterious Kang?

Title: American Born Chinese
Cast: Stars:, Ben Wang, , Yann Yann Yeo, , Chin Han, , Jimmy Liu
Synopsis: Jin Wang is an average teenager balancing high school and home life. When he meets a new foreign student on the first day of the school, even more worlds collide as Jin is unwittingly entangled in a battle with Chinese mythological gods.

Title: Asteroid City
Cast: Director:, Wes Anderson, | ,     Stars:, Jason Schwartzman, , Scarlett Johansson, , Tom Hanks, , Jeffrey Wright
Synopsis: The itinerary of a Junior Stargazer convention is spectacularly disrupted by world-changing events.

Title: Platonic
Cast: Stars:, Rose Byrne, , Seth Rogen, , Tre Hale, , Andrew Lopez
Synopsis: Former childhood best friends reconnect as adults and try to get past the rift that led to their falling out.

Title: I Think You Should Leave with Tim Robinson
Cast: Stars:, Tim Robinson, , Sam Richardson, , Patti Harrison, , Conner O'Malley
Synopsis: A sketch show where Tim Robinson and his guests spend each segment driving someone to the point of needing -- or desperately wanting -- to leave.

Title: A Man Called Otto
Cast: Director:, Marc Forster, | ,     Stars:, Tom Hanks, , Mariana Treviño, , Rachel Keller, , John Higgins
Synopsis: Otto is a grump who's given up on life following the loss of his wife and wants to end it all. When a young family moves in nearby, he meets his match in quick-witted Marisol, leading to a friendship that will turn his world around.

Title: Jury Duty
Cast: Stars:, James Marsden, , Alan Barinholtz, , Susan Berger, , Cassandra Blair
Synopsis: It follows the workings of an American jury trial through the eyes of Ronald Gladden, a juror who is unaware the entire case is fake. Everyone except him is an actor, and everything that happens is carefully planned.

Title: Young Sheldon
Cast: Stars:, Iain Armitage, , Zoe Perry, , Lance Barber, , Montana Jordan
Synopsis: Meet a child genius named Sheldon Cooper (already seen as an adult in The Big Bang Theory (2007)) and his family. Some unique challenges face Sheldon, who is socially impaired.

Title: XO, Kitty
Cast: Stars:, Anna Cathcart, , Minyeong Choi, , Gia Kim, , Sang Heon Lee
Synopsis: A new love story unfolds when teen matchmaker Kitty reunites with her long-distance boyfriend at the same boarding school attended by her late mother.

Title: The Boys
Cast: Stars:, Karl Urban, , Jack Quaid, , Antony Starr, , Erin Moriarty
Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: Shameless
Cast: Stars:, Emmy Rossum, , William H. Macy, , Ethan Cutkosky, , Jeremy Allen White
Synopsis: A scrappy, feisty, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

Title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
Cast: Stars:, Charlie Day, , Rob McElhenney, , Kaitlin Olson, , Glenn Howerton
Synopsis: Five friends with big egos and small brains are the proprietors of an Irish pub in Philadelphia.

Title: The Office
Cast: Stars:, Steve Carell, , Jenna Fischer, , John Krasinski, , Rainn Wilson
Synopsis: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

Title: Poker Face
Cast: Stars:, Natasha Lyonne, , Benjamin Bratt, , Simon Helberg, , Pedro Hollywood
Synopsis: Charlie has an extraordinary ability to determine when someone is lying. She hits the road with her Plymouth Barracuda and with every stop encounters a new cast of characters and strange crimes she can't help but investigate and solve.

Title: Beef
Cast: Stars:, Steven Yeun, , Ali Wong, , Joseph Lee, , Young Mazino
Synopsis: Two people let a road rage incident burrow into their minds and slowly consume their every thought and action.

Title: The White Lotus
Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Coolidge, , Jon Gries, , F. Murray Abraham, , Adam DiMarco
Synopsis: The exploits of various guests and employees of a tropical resort over the span of a week.

Title: About My Father
Cast: Director:, Laura Terruso, | ,     Stars:, Robert De Niro, , Sebastian Maniscalco, , Leslie Bibb, , Kim Cattrall
Synopsis: When Sebastian tells his old-school Italian immigrant father Salvo that he is going to propose to his all-American girlfriend, Salvo insists on crashing a weekend with her tony parents.

Title: White Men Can't Jump
Cast: Director:, Calmatic, | ,     Stars:, Sinqua Walls, , Jack Harlow, , Lance Reddick, , Teyana Taylor
Synopsis: A remake of the 1992 film about a pair of basketball hustlers who team up to earn extra cash.

Title: Modern Family
Cast: Stars:, Ed O'Neill, , Sofía Vergara, , Julie Bowen, , Ty Burrell
Synopsis: Three different but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.

Title: Fool's Paradise
Cast: Director:, Charlie Day, | ,     Stars:, Charlie Day, , Ken Jeong, , Kate Beckinsale, , Adrien Brody
Synopsis: A fool for love becomes an accidental celebrity only to lose it all.

Title: Suits
Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Macht, , Patrick J. Adams, , Meghan Markle, , Sarah Rafferty
Synopsis: On the run from a drug deal gone bad, brilliant college dropout Mike Ross finds himself working with Harvey Specter, one of New York City's best lawyers.

Title: BlackBerry
Cast: Director:, Matt Johnson, | ,     Stars:, Jay Baruchel, , Glenn Howerton, , Matt Johnson, , Kelly Van der Burg
Synopsis: The story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone.

Title: The Big Bang Theory
Cast: Stars:, Johnny Galecki, , Jim Parsons, , Kaley Cuoco, , Simon Helberg
Synopsis: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

Title: One Piece
Cast: Stars:, Mayumi Tanaka, , Laurent Vernin, , Tony Beck, , Akemi Okamura
Synopsis: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger. The famous mystery treasure named "One Piece".

Title: Friends
Cast: Stars:, Jennifer Aniston, , Courteney Cox, , Lisa Kudrow, , Matt LeBlanc
Synopsis: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty year-old friends living in the Manhattan borough of New York City.

Title: Dave
Cast: Stars:, Dave Burd, , Andrew Santino, , Gata, , Taylor Misiak
Synopsis: A neurotic mid-20s suburbanite's convinced he's destined to be one of the greatest rappers of all time. Now he's got to prove it to everyone else.

Title: The Year I Started Masturbating
Cast: Director:, Erika Wasserman, | ,     Stars:, Katia Winter, , Jesper Zuschlag, , Henrik Dorsin, , Nour El-Refai
Synopsis: Goal-oriented Hanna wants another child before it is too late, but unexpectedly her boyfriend breaks up with her, and Hanna's world collapses. Hanna begins to realize that she may be chasing the wrong things in life.

Title: Somebody Somewhere
Cast: Stars:, Bridget Everett, , Jeff Hiller, , Mary Catherine Garrison, , Murray Hill
Synopsis: Sam is a true Kansan on the surface, but, beneath it all, struggles to fit the hometown mould. Grappling with loss and acceptance, she discovers herself and a community of outsiders who don't fit in but don't give up.

Title: Renfield
Cast: Director:, Chris McKay, | ,     Stars:, Nicholas Hoult, , Nicolas Cage, , Awkwafina, , Ben Schwartz
Synopsis: Renfield, Dracula's henchman and inmate at the lunatic asylum for decades, longs for a life away from the Count, his various demands, and all of the bloodshed that comes with them.

Title: Bones
Cast: Stars:, Emily Deschanel, , David Boreanaz, , Michaela Conlin, , T.J. Thyne
Synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.

Title: Shrinking
Cast: Stars:, Jason Segel, , Jessica Williams, , Harrison Ford, , Luke Tennie
Synopsis: A grieving therapist starts to tell his clients exactly what he thinks. Ignoring his training and ethics, he finds himself making huge changes to people's lives - including his own.

Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Cast: Directors:, Daniel Kwan, , Daniel Scheinert, | ,     Stars:, Michelle Yeoh, , Stephanie Hsu, , Jamie Lee Curtis, , Ke Huy Quan
Synopsis: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.

Title: Beau Is Afraid
Cast: Director:, Ari Aster, | ,     Stars:, Joaquin Phoenix, , Patti LuPone, , Amy Ryan, , Nathan Lane
Synopsis: Following the sudden death of his mother, a mild-mannered but anxiety-ridden man confronts his darkest fears as he embarks on an epic, Kafkaesque odyssey back home.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Vin Diesel, , Bradley Cooper, , Zoe Saldana
Synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

Title: I'm a Virgo
Cast: Stars:, Brett Gray, , Rachel Thurow, , Varsha Chand, , Lindsey G. Smith
Synopsis: A coming-of-age joyride about Cootie, a 13-foot-tall man, who escapes to experience the beauty and contradictions of the real world; he forms friendships, finds love, navigates awkward situations, and encounters his idol named The Hero.
